author: Hobbythom
title: Great parts pack
review:
I am not going to lie; I bought this set for parts. Two actually. I am not sure if there has ever been a set this size with so many unique parts. Building it however, I found out it is a very neat set in itself as wel.

Box/Instructions

Your standard friends box with standard instructions, nothing special.

Parts

Where to start with the goodies? Inverted tan slopes, postcards, slopes in a rare color, masonry bricks and of course the new decorative tan elements and the transparent accessory holders. Al in all a great selection of parts

Minifigures

A friends minidol. I always give these to my nieces so I'm not sure what to tell you about it's particularities.

The build

It is a straightforward build, nothing overly complex.

The completed model

A surprisingly good model. This would fit right at home at any park or even small train station (just change the green plates for grey). Combine to back to back to create an ever better model which would do well as a kiosk on a grand square.

Overall opinion

You can not go wrong with this set. Whether you build city, castle, friends or just about any other theme (excluding space maybe) this set provides some great parts!
